text: Are there any other posts/announcements/info about this before I try it out?
`type="module"` if we can do this on the script tag we should be able to use es6 modules but iâ€™d imagine the current minification methods being used on js files might break that.
So after trying this in the DM it seems like you can def use es6 modules now in HubSpot. But just from using normal JS files
But I dont think that you would be able to do it from a module.js file

Hello, I'm trying to send a transactional email through <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing/transactional-emails|this endpoint>, but I'm getting this error: `There was an issue sending an email to this contact. Hmm. This 'from' address looks invalid` Do you know what could be wrong? Is there any specific rule to use an email in the "from" field?
